Cucu Sumantri Akan Memperbaiki Kualitas Wasit
02 Nov 2019, 20:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI terpilih, Cucu Sumantri, akan memperbaiki kualitas wasit sebagai bagian dari programnya ke depan. Dia ingin para pengadil lapangan bisa menjalankan tugasnya dengan baik dan profesional.
Menurut perwira TNI berpangkat mayor jenderal tersebut, dirinya akan memperbaiki kualitas wasit dengan meningkatkan kompetensi mereka. Salah satunya, dengan menggandeng instruktur wasit dari luar.
"Salah satu konsen kita juga memperbaiki kualitas wasit sehingga dapat melaksanakan tugas dengan baik," kata Cucu Sumantri, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Salah satunya berpikir meningkatkan kualitas wasit dengan rekrut pelatih wasit dari luar yang profesional termasuk pelatihan meningkatkan kualitas wasit sesuai profesionalisme yang kita harapkan," sambungnya.
Cucu Sumantri terpilih menjadi wakil ketua umum PSSI dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) yang berlangsung di Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta. Dia meraih suara terbanyak bersama dengan Iwan Budianto.

Cucu Sumantri Will Improve The Quality of Referees
02 Nov 2019, 20:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The elected PSSI Deputy Chairperson, Cucu Sumantri, will improve the quality of referees as part of his program going forward. He wants the court courts to be able to carry out their duties properly and professionally.
According to the TNI officer with the rank of major general, he would improve the quality of referees by increasing their competence. One of them, by cooperating with the referee instructor from outside.
"One of our concentrations is also improving the quality of referees so that they can carry out their duties properly," said Cucu Sumantri, Saturday (11/02/2019).
"One of them is thinking about improving the quality of referees by recruiting referee trainers from outside who are professional including training to improve the quality of referees according to the professionalism that we expect," he continued.
Cucu Sumantri was elected as deputy chairman of PSSI at the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta. He won the most votes along with Iwan Budianto.
